mapper.select: SELECT d.guid taskGuid, d.transport_code transportCode, to_char(d.start_time ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') startTime, to_char(d.end_time ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') endTime, d.task_name taskName, lt.transport_name transportName, pt.officer_name officerName, up.guid pgGuid, up.target_name targetName, up.target_type targetType, to_char( up.check_time ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') groupCheckTime, ad.grid_name gridName, ad.grid_code gridCode, ad.is_important isImportant, il.guid detailGuid, to_char(il.check_time ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') checkTime, il.result_code resultCodeDetail, il.is_punish isPunish, cm.item_desc itemName, ct.result_name resultName from b_patrolrecord d LEFT JOIN b_participant pt on d.guid=pt.record_guid LEFT JOIN t_lawtransport lt on d.transport_code=lt.transport_code LEFT JOIN b_patrolgroup up on d.guid=up.task_guid LEFT JOIN t_areagrid ad on up.grid_guid=ad.guid LEFT JOIN b_patroldetail il on up.guid=il.pg_guid LEFT JOIN t_d_checkresult ct on il.result_code=ct.result_code LEFT JOIN t_checkitem cm on il.item_code =cm.item_code where d.guid = #{taskGuid} order by il.check_time desc
